bm.title: Congratulations to Winners of FE's Halong Bay Vietnam Incentive Holiday (05th - 08th June 2009)!

meta.description: Winners who attended FE's 1 Million Quantum Pendant Celebration Banquet on 23rd May 2009 were presented with Certificates of Achievement by FE's Founder CEO, Paul Ting and posed for a group photo. Enjoy your holiday, you have earned it! See you at the Top! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!!
meta.author: klhunter
